channel.title: [317] Looking For A Development Team [317]
channel.description:
[center]Hey Guys, I am in the process of creating the PERFECT PK'ing Server. I am using the [i]Lost Legacy[/i] base, which can be found here: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/476948-lost-legacy-real-release.html
I am looking for a team of the following positions: GFX Designer, Web Developer, Server Developer, and Client Developer. I have very little java knowledge, and a little bit of Web Design knowledge. My job is to oversee everyone, I will make sure everything is running how it should be. I have many ideas to keep each of you busy, and at the same time make our server the best PK server online. I will cover any and all expenses (VPS, Web Hosting), and if in the future I think you are doing a good job - I may contract you to a paid position.[/center]
[center]I will update this thread with more information/pictures later, but if you are interested in the job please do the following: Add my skype: xerobots
Fill out an Application
Position Applying For: Previous Work: Years of Experience: Any additional information:[/center]
[center]Things like age, and years of experience don't really matter. I'm just looking for skilled people that are looking to become part of something big.[/center]

item.title: [317] Looking For A Development Team [317]
item.dc:creator: @scar3d scar3d
item.description:
@scar3d wrote:

Position Applying For:Server Developer/Client Developer (Can help both sides.)
Previous Work:Never really settled down on a server to work on.
Years of Experience: Around 2
Any additional information: Not really
f

Read full topic
